message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
I'll give you a good deal, but I want a bit more.
I'll give you a bit more, but I'm not giving away too much!
You're not giving me enough, I'm willing to take a bit less, but I need a bigger share.
I'll give you a bit more, but I'm not going to give away the farm!
I'm not giving up, I'll take a smaller share now, but I'll get the better deal eventually!
I'm not giving in, I'll give you a bit more, but I'm not going to get taken for a ride!
I'm getting desperate, but I'll take a small share, don't expect me to give up now!
